title: MeTube LXC
textContent:
MeTube LXC 
                MeTube
                    allows
                    you to download videos from YouTube and dozens of other sites.
                To create a new Proxmox VE MeTube LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update MeTube, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/metube.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 10GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                MeTube Interface: IP:8081
outerHTML:
MeTube LXC

MeTube allows you to download videos from YouTube and dozens of other sites.

To create a new Proxmox VE MeTube LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update MeTube, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/metube.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 10GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

MeTube Interface: IP:8081
